caption.p: Bioactive compounds from microalgae include: carotenoids, Î²-carotene ( a). astaxanthin ( b), and fucoxanthin ( c); phycobilins, phycocyanin ( d) and phycoerythrin ( e); sulfated polysaccharides ( f); omega-3 fatty acids, docosahexaenoic acid ( g), docosapentaenoic acid ( h), and eicosapentaenoic acid ( i); and phenolics, rutin ( j) and eckol ( k).
